descriptionHtml:
so, this is my first time messing with a creation kit.

i managed to scratch this up in about an hour and a half.

i have ideas for a storyline, and can continue to build. but i have zero scripting and modeling skills.

if anyone is interested in helping me out with scripting and modeling, a pm would be greatly appreciated.

-------------------------------------------------------

Hope\'s End, for now, is just an altar found north of Rorikstead.

It currently only exists as a visual change, but it does contain the gem \"Hope\'s End\" (just a filler model for now) that is worth 15,000 gold. 

Feel free to explore and leave feedback.
author: Jonathan Stonecipher
